xmlcomponents
Class JodeList

java.lang.Object
  xmlcomponents.JodeList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Jode>
public class JodeList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Jode>

Represents a List of Jode . Will usually be created by calling children() on a Jode.

Author:
Justin Nelson

distinct

public JodeList distinct()
Returns a new JodeList containing one node of each name

Returns:
a JodeList containing only distinct elements. Will select the first node with a given name in the list.

single

public Jode single(java.lang.String nodeName)
Will return the only element of this list with the given node name. If there is more than one matching element, this will throw an JinqException.

Parameters:
nodeName - the name of the node to return
Returns:
the single node matching the given name

single

public Jode single(JodeFilter filter)
Will give you to single element of this list matching a given name. If there is more than one matching element, this will throw an JinqException.

Parameters:
filter - the filter to apply to this list
Returns:
the single node matching this filter
